task.summary: Backend/database/migrations/qr_codes: [update] - added img tag and renamed times_scanned to max_scan_times
Backend/: [update] - QRCode class to QrCode for easier laravel function integration
Backend/app/Http/Controllers/Api: [create] - QrCodeController api endpoint and added methods for validation
Backend/app/Http/Controllers/Api: [update] - increment User's signature count after successful validation
Backend/database/migrations: [add] - img field to users table
backend/public/img: [add] - user img to public directory
Backend/app/Http/: [move] - auth controllers to auth directory
Backend/routes/api: [update] - meals resource and scan-qr-code endpoints
Backend/app/Http/Resources/MealResource: [add] - ratings to meal resource and favorites count
Backend/{}/LoginApiController: [fix] - user id to return value
Backend/app/Rating: [add] - fillable attributes for mass assignment
Backend/app/Http/Controllers/Api/MealApiController@index: [update] - add filter for daily or weekly request
Backend/app/Rating: [fix] - users & meal relationship from hasOne to belongsTo
Backend/database/migrations/: [fix] - migration names for qr_codes and qr_code_user, add id and timestamps to weekly_menu table
Backend/app/Meal: [add] - img to mass assignable attributes
Backend/app/User: [add] - img to mass assignable attributes
Backend/app/Http/Controllers/Api/MealApiController: [add] - user favorites count to meal index api
Backend/app/Console/Commands: [add] - dummy data for db seeding
Backend/resources/views/welcome: [update] - view with 3 qr codes examples
Backend/database/seeds/{}: [add] - 1 more Meal per each day; [create] - testing User
